title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 427 - State Register Of Historic Places
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 427 - State Register Of Historic Places

State Regulations
§ 427.1 - Concurrent consideration of properties for listing on the state and national registers
§ 427.2 - Nomination of properties to the state register only
§ 427.3 - Criteria for listing
§ 427.4 - Notice and comment
§ 427.5 - Review and listing
§ 427.6 - Effect of national register eligibility determination on state register eligibility
§ 427.7 - Revisions to listings
§ 427.8 - Public access to information
§ 427.20 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. I, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 427

Statutory authority: Parks, Recreation and Historic

Preservation Law, §§3.09[8], 14.07[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
